snippet: All over the New York region, people rediscovered the joys of electricity for a day or two only to be plunged back into frustration when heavy snows downed power lines on Wednesday.
abstract: Residents all over the New York metropolitan region people rejoice as their electricity is restored for a day or two, only to be plunged back into frustration and darkness when heavy snows down power lines and cut power once again.
lead_paragraph: All over the New York region, people rediscovered the joys of electricity for a day or two only to be plunged back into frustration when heavy snows downed power lines on Wednesday.

headline.seo: In Second Storm, Some Lose Power for the Second Time
headline.main: Power, Freshly Restored, Goes Back Out for Some
headline.print_headline: Power, Freshly Restored, Goes Back Out for Some

keywords.value: Public Service Electric and Gas Co
